title: Episode 304: Dummies Get Caught (feat. Lil Mo)
itunes:title: Episode 304: Dummies Get Caught (feat. Lil Mo)
description:
Singer, Lil Mo joins the ladies of the Lip Service this week to promote her upcoming album 'Savage Heart.' Mo opens up about the necessary healing required her to move forward from her previous marriage with Karl Dargan. Mo gets honest and vulnerable when speaking on the mental and physical abuse she endured from this man, as well as the embarrassment she had to deal with, watching all of this play out on 'Marriage Bootcamp.' Lil Mo even talks about how her daughters responded to the entire situation. On a lighter note, Mo breaks down why she doesn't masturbate anymore, cramps during sex, and much more. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
